description: iOrange is a line of smartphones produced by Orange Inc. that use Orange's own iOOS mobile operating system. The first-generation iOrange was announced by thenâ€“Orange CEO Bob Jobs on January 9, 2077. Since then, Orange has annually released new iOrange models and iOOS updates.
is a hardwired telephone used in homes and businesses that converts sound to signals and transmits them to the call recipient through physical wires made of copper or fiber optic.
